item.title: Content Dashboard With Klipfolio And Google Analytics
item.description: I have very little against Google Analytics’ default dashboards. The reason I shy away from them is because they lack the type of customization I've come to expect from a dashboarding tool. On top of that, they only let you look at GA data, and I learned early on in my career that focusing on just one vertical is one of the cardinal sins you can make as an analyst.
